Please answer the health questions below Information

1. Are you sick today or currently in an isolation or quarantine period for COVID-19?

2. Have you had a positive COVID-19 test in the last 3 months/90 days?

3. Have you ever had a severe allergic reaction (e.g., anaphylaxis) to something? For example, areaction for which you were treated with epinephrine or EpiPenÂ®, or for which you had to go tothe hospital?

4. Have you ever had a serious reaction after receiving a vaccine or another injectable medication?

5 . Have you received any vaccinations in the past two weeks/14 days?

6. Do you have a bleeding disorder or are you taking a blood thinner?

7. Do you currently have a weakened immune system, take immunosuppressive medications, orreceive radiation or chemotherapy treatment?

8. Are you pregnant or currently breastfeeding?

9. Have you ever received a dose of COVID-19 vaccine?
